Legal_Issue: Standard of review for credibility findings by RAD
Credibility_Assessment: RPD found applicant not credible; RAD upheld assessment
Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution due to sexual orientation in Algeria
Decision_Maker: Refugee Protection Division (RPD), Refugee Appeal Division (RAD)
Application_Error: Alleged incorrect standard of review (correctness vs. reasonableness)
Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard applies to credibility findings
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RAD committed a reviewable error in applying reasonableness standard
Outcome_of_Review: Application dismissed; RAD's use of reasonableness standard confirmed
Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credibility regarding fear of persecution based on sexual orientation
Credibility_Issues: Applicant's lack of credibility regarding personal circumstances and risk upon return
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged standard of review as unreasonable
Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative appeals
